org.swerverobotics.library.internal

Interface IOpModeStateTransitionEvents

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaFruitBNO055IMU, AdaFruitTCS34725ColorSensor, LegacyOrModernColorSensor

    public interface IOpModeStateTransitionEvents
    An interface used to receive notifications about various OpMode state transitions

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onRobotShutdown()
      The robot is in the process of shutting down.
      boolean onUserOpModeStop()
      A user OpMode has just stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • onUserOpModeStop

        boolean onUserOpModeStop()
        A user OpMode has just stopped. Robot motion should cease.
        Returns:
        if true, the receiver will not receive *any* more opmode state transitions

      • onRobotShutdown

        boolean onRobotShutdown()
        The robot is in the process of shutting down. All hardware devices, for example, should close().
        Returns:
        if true, the receiver will not receive *any* more opmode state transitions
        See Also:
        HardwareDevice.close()
